title: Leaving Tropeoulhos
creator_credit: Anastasia Solomidis and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Anastasia and her husband lived in a village in Greece. One day a government official arrived to ask whether they would consider migrating to Australia. They talked about it and decided that they had better take up this opportunity to improve their lives and provide opportunities for their children.
